Turning your seating area into a platform for lounging is the versatile Brimmer Collection. Click-motion mechanisms allow for the multi-directional lounger back to go from upright to flat with little effort. The split-back end allows for the first adjustment from flat surface of the sleeper into a lounge position. The second adjusted position modifies the unit into a sofa.
